verbs.description: At a [V: speaking] [ARG1: engagement] with black MPs in London Wednesday , MSNBC host and civil rights leader Al Sharpton told reporters that unless Democrats make a show of themselves in the near future , Trump could win a second term in 2020 .

[ARGM-LOC: At a speaking engagement with black MPs in London Wednesday] , [ARG0: MSNBC host and civil rights leader Al Sharpton] [V: told] [ARG2: reporters] [ARG1: that unless Democrats make a show of themselves in the near future , Trump could win a second term in 2020] .

At a speaking engagement with black MPs in London Wednesday , MSNBC host and civil rights leader Al Sharpton told reporters that unless [ARG0: Democrats] [V: make] [ARG1: a show of themselves] [ARGM-TMP: in the near future] , Trump could win a second term in 2020 .

At a speaking engagement with black MPs in London Wednesday , MSNBC host and civil rights leader Al Sharpton told reporters that unless Democrats make a show of themselves in the near future , Trump [V: could] win a second term in 2020 .

At a speaking engagement with black MPs in London Wednesday , MSNBC host and civil rights leader Al Sharpton told reporters that [ARGM-ADV: unless Democrats make a show of themselves in the near future] , [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: win] [ARG1: a second term] [ARGM-TMP: in 2020] .
